posts.post_content:
Joe Doyle NYA in a sparkling SGC A holder.

Brilliant image on a reasonably centered front with barely perceptible paper loss on the mundane Piedmont 350 back.  If the paper loss bothers you, just don't turn the card over.;)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10044/doyle-joe[/IMG]

The price including shipping is $77.45.  Feel free to offer more or less.
